column1: ### Capital and OM data is primarily pulled from table 3 of the AEO at https://www.eia.gov/outlooks/aeo/assumptions/ . Storage costs are from Sergi et al's battery costs converted to 2021$ and normalized to a 60% match
### This data has values for both CT and CC gas plants and are separated by EIA data
### Values for fuel prices are pulled from the 2022 AEO and are stored in the fuelCost.csv. Note that "primary_fuel_type" names should align between the files
